price: সিহঁতৰ শাস্তি লাঘৱ কৰা নহ’ব আৰু সিহঁতে তাত হতাশ হৈ পৰিব।
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
